pages.text: Fusion Reactor Ports are part of the $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l) multiblock.$(p)They allow you to input $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l), $(l:chemicals/tritium)Tritium$(/l), $(l:chemicals/deuterium)Deuterium$(/l), water (for water-cooled). They can also output power/steam.
